fields.description: The Salesforce API version used in ADF. The version must be larger than or equal to 47.0 which is required by Salesforce BULK API 2.0. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ApiVersion

fields.description: The authentication type to be used to connect to the Salesforce. Currently, we only support OAuth2ClientCredentials, it is also the default value
fields.name: AuthenticationType

fields.description: The client Id for OAuth 2.0 Client Credentials Flow authentication of the Salesforce instance. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ClientId

fields.description: The encrypted credential used for authentication. Credentials are encrypted using the integration runtime credential manager. Type: string.
fields.name: EncryptedCredential

fields.description: The URL of Salesforce instance. For example, 'https://[domain].my.salesforce.com'. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: EnvironmentUrl
